entry.title: Stablecoins Poised To Tackle Issues Unresolved By Bitcoin And Ethereum – Report
entry.summary:
Stablecoins, the digital assets designed to minimize price volatility, are poised for a significant metamorphosis in the near future, driven by the evolving demands of the competitive financial landscape.
Jeff Lewis, a key figure in Pantera Capital, has emphasized the imperative need for stablecoin providers to integrate money market yields into their offerings to retain a competitive edge.
As the crypto market continues to expand, the role of stablecoins is becoming increasingly vital, catering to the demand for secure and reliable digital transactions.
Bitcoin And Ethereum’s Aspirations Vs. Reality
According to a recent report, which cites Lewis’ insights shared in a letter, Bitcoin and Ethereum, despite their widespread success, have not fulfilled the original expectations m…

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Technical Analysis: Market Holds Its Breath for Fed’s Upcoming Policy Decision
entry.summary:
As November 2023 unfolds, the crypto economy is buzzing with market activity, showcasing a striking performance from bitcoin (BTC) alongside a steady progression from ethereum (ETH). Crypto markets are calm and consolidated at the moment, as market observers and traders wait for the news stemming from the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) policy announcement.
Bitcoin and Ethereum Show Divergent Paths Navigating Uncertain Waters
Hours before the upcoming FOMC meeting, the crypto economy’s net value is coasting along at $1.3 trillion. Investors are waiting to see whether or not the U.S. Federal Reserve will raise the federal funds rate. However, the CME Fedwatch Tool shows a 97% chance a rate hike will not come to fruition. U.S. 10-year Treasury yields are lower, but the long-term bon…

entry.title: Metamask and Blockaid Unite to Fortify Web3 Security With Security Alerts
entry.summary:
In a recent development, Metamask, a self-custody Web3 platform developed by Consensys, has partnered with Blockaid, a Web3 security provider. The collaboration aims to integrate security alerts within the Metamask extension in order to enhance the platform’s security features.
Metamask and Blockaid Collaborate for Web3 Security
The latest Metamask initiative focuses on detecting and stopping malicious transactions, offering protection against various cyber threats such as scams, phishing attempts, and hacking. The collaboration between Metamask and Blockaid has reportedly prevented a significant security breach, protecting over $100,000 in assets from a targeted hack on an account associated with Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin.
The security alerts represent a new development in…

entry.title: BitGo Secures German Crypto Custody License from BaFin
entry.summary: BitGo, a U.S.-regulated cryptocurrency custody firm, obtained a cryptocurrency custody license from the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (BaFin). This development secures BitGo's presence in the European market. From New York Trust Charter to BaFin License Germany has been active in Europe regarding the regulation and oversight of cryptocurrency and digital asset custody. The country has implemented laws and regulations that encourage both banks and specialized custody providers to engage in handling of digital assets while offering associated services. “BaFin is recognized as one of the world's key trendsetters in crypto regulation. It enables the progress that digital currencies entail while creating a secure regulatory framework,” said Dejan Maljevic,…

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Defense Breaks Down: Testifies To Issues Within FTX
entry.summary:
The trial of the former CEO of the defunct crypto exchange FTX, Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF), continued on October 31, with the prosecution cross-examining the defendant. Despite the line of questioning from the prosecutor, SBF managed to spin his narrative on what went on at the crypto exchange. However, it remains to be seen if this will be enough to sway the jury.
Sam Bankman-Fried Says He Didn’t Know Much About The Bug
So far, the prosecution had been able to establish that Sam Bankman-Fried was in the know of everything that went on at the defunct crypto exchange and trading firm Alameda Research and, in fact, was the mastermind of all the illicit activities that went on there.
With this in mind, the defendant was hell-bent on creating doubts in the minds of the jury members. Whi…

entry.title: X Valued at $19 Billion a Year After Musk Bought Twitter for $44 Billion, Reports
entry.summary:
Social media company X is now worth less than half of what Elon Musk paid for Twitter, according to internal documents quoted by the press. The billionaire investor purchased the platform, Twitter at the time of acquisition, for $44 billion last October. He has previously admitted to overpaying for it.
Social Media Giant X Worth Less Than Half of the Price Elon Musk Paid for Twitter
Elon Musk’s social media platform X, formerly Twitter, has valued itself at $19 billion, a number of media outlets revealed at the start of the week. That’s around 55% less than what the tech entrepreneur paid for the company in October 2022.
The figure is based on equity in the company offered to employees in the form of restricted stock units at $45 a share, the New York Times and Fortune Magazine repo…

entry.title: Dogecoin Bulls On Hold: Analyst Cautions Vs. Premature DOGE Expectations
entry.summary:
Dogecoin (DOGE) enthusiasts may need to temper their optimism, as a prominent cryptocurrency analyst warns of a looming deep pullback. The meme coin’s recent struggle to breach a critical resistance level has raised concerns about its short-term prospects.
In the world of cryptocurrency trading, resistance levels play a crucial role. These levels represent price points where an asset has historically struggled to move past. Resistance levels are significant because they reflect the collective sentiment of traders and investors. When an asset encounters resistance and fails to break through, it often signifies a lack of buying pressure and can lead to a reversal in price.
At the time of writing, Dogecoin is trading at approximately $0.067399 via CoinGecko, experiencing a 2.6% dip in the…

entry.title: Brazilian Tax Authority Acknowledges ‘Vertiginous Growth’ of Stablecoin Trading
entry.summary: The Brazilian Tax Authority (RBF) recently published an article acknowledging the growth in stablecoin trading in the country, which has taken the Brazilian cryptocurrency market by storm. The most transacted stablecoin is Tether’s USDT, which has moved more than 271 billion reals (close to $54 billion) since the organization started registering these purchases in 2019. Brazilian Tax Authority Reports Stablecoin Trading Growth The Brazilian tax authority (RBF) has recently reported “vertiginous growth” in the trading of stablecoins, tokens tied to the value of other currencies, in the country, surpassing the volumes of cryptocurrencies like BTC. The organization states that their characteristics make them “more stable in value,” expanding the possibility of using them as a means of payment…

entry.title: Shiba Inu Lead Dev Heralds New Era For Shibarium
entry.summary:
In a major announcement yesterday, Shytoshi Kusama, the lead developer of the Shiba Inu project, unveiled the ambitious “Shib Name Service” (SNS) on the Shibarium platform. The announcement was made through a blog post shared via X (formerly known as Twitter), with Kusama teasing, “No tricks here, only the first of many treats.”
Shiba Inu’s Name Service Goes Live
The Shib Name Service (SNS) stands at the heart of this announcement which was teased with a countdown. Beyond just being a new feature, SNS represents “a new era on Shibarium” and an innovative approach to how users interact with addresses.
Traditional blockchain addresses, characterized by their complex strings of letters and numbers, have been a deterrent for many users. But as Kusama explained, with SNS, “No longer will …

entry.title: Bitcoin Celebrates 15 Years: Forecasting The Boundless Growth Ahead
entry.summary:
Fifteen years ago, an unidentified individual known as Satoshi Nakamoto introduced the groundbreaking white paper Bitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System, redefining how value is transferred in the digital realm.
This concise nine-page document outlined revolutionary concepts, such as cryptographic hashing, block architecture, and timing mechanisms, fundamentally altering societal perspectives on money and initiating a global movement toward decentralized currencies.
Nakamoto’s vision not only transformed the technological landscape but also sparked a reevaluation of traditional financial systems, reshaping discussions on monetary value and control.
Bitcoin’s 15-Year Journey: A Phenomenal Evolution
Celebrating its 15th birthday today, Bitcoin’s remarkable journey has …

entry.title: Blockchain Governance — A Look at the Top 5 DAO Treasuries in 2023
entry.summary:
Over seven years ago, on April 30, 2016, the first decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) emerged, marking a significant shift in the digital world. However, just three months later, a cyberattack brought it down, leading to its unfortunate collapse. Today, the landscape has transformed dramatically, with numerous DAOs thriving, and 179 treasuries surpassing $1 million. In total, these organizations hold $18 billion in assets, both liquid and vested. As of 2023, the top five DAO treasuries alone hold $11 billion, spread across various token assets.
2023’s Leading DAOs
Various sectors in the world of digital assets have been hit by the crypto winter but decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) have seen growth. In essence, a DAO stands as a digital governance model, orchest…

entry.title: Judge Urges for SEC Decision on Planned Celsius Restart as Crypto Miner
entry.summary:
America’s securities regulator has been urged to decide if it will approve a plan to transform Celsius Network into a bitcoin mining firm. The proposal seeks to repay customers of the bankrupt cryptocurrency lender with both crypto assets and stock in a new publicly traded mining entity.
New York Judge Hopes for Expedited SEC Decision on Celsius’ Repayment Proposal
Judge Martin Glenn, who oversees the bankruptcy of Celsius, has called on the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to quickly decide whether it will authorize the company to transform itself into a crypto mining firm, Bloomberg reported.
During a court hearing on Monday, Glenn told a lawyer representing the regulator that he hopes the SEC will expedite the decision-making process because Celsius and its creditors …

They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: Digital Ownership Explained
entry.summary: One of the most powerful aspects of blockchain technology is its ability to provide us genuine ownership of our digital assets. This is called digital ownership. In this video, we’ll deep dive into digital ownership, why it matters, and how web3 makes owning digital assets like our social networks, music libraries, personal data, and beyond possible. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at Consensys.

entry.title: Martin Shkreli on E/ACC and SBF in Prison
entry.summary: Reza Jafery and Martin Shkreli sit down for a casual conversation about the growing movement that is E/ACC, what songs they could recite at gunpoint, and whether or not SBF will thrive or just survive during his time in prison.

entry.title: What Can AI Do in Gaming?
entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss how artificial intelligence can shape the video game experience.
